instruction: Delete the 3rd sentence from the following following text
input: People have been using masks for thousands of years for ritual, ceremony, and protection. Masks have been used for theater, masquerade balls, carnivals, and other celebrations. Masks can help us understand the ways in which we express our unique identities. They can reveal something of the wearer or the model that he or she is portraying.
output: People have been using masks for thousands of years for ritual, ceremony, and protection. Masks have been used for theater, masquerade balls, carnivals, and other celebrations. They can help us understand the ways in which we express our unique identities. They can reveal something of the wearer or the model that he or she is portraying.
